metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42252 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in aspeed_lpc_ctrl_mmap indrivers/soc/aspeed/aspeed-lpc-ctrl.c in the Linux kernel before 5.14.6.Local attackers able to access the Aspeed LPC control interface couldoverwrite memory in the kernel and potentially execute privileges, akaCID-b49a0e69a7b1. This occurs because a certain comparison uses values thatare not memory sizes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-42252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-90-generic - 5.4.0-90.101
linux-image-5.4.0-90-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-90.101
